name: AVCaptionGrouper
desc: An object that analyzes the temporal overlaps of caption objects to create caption groups for each span of concurrent captions.

items.name: func add(AVCaption)
items.desc: Adds a caption to the pending group.

items.name: func flushAddedCaptions(upTo: CMTime) -> [AVCaptionGroup]
items.desc: Creates caption groups for the captions you enqueue up to the time.
